experiences.title: Senior Software Engineer
experiences.description: My final role at HackerRank allowed me to focus on three areas I'm passionate about: accessibility, developer experience, and mentorship. This period was defined by leading large-scale initiatives and mentoring the next generation of engineers.
achievements: Led accessibility improvements for over 6,200 problem descriptions, creating systems to identify, categorize, and fix issues at scale
Customized VSCode for platform needs and standardized iframe communication using Penpal
Mentored junior engineers from onboarding through feature ownership, providing technical guidance and career development
Improved hiring processes by developing interview questions that better reflect real-world engineering challenges

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer II
experiences.description: As I moved into a more senior role, the pandemic hit, and our priorities shifted. Remote work became the norm, and our platform needed to adapt to support remote hiring processes. This period marked my deep dive into accessibility and real-time architecture.
achievements: Led the effort to make HackerRank Screen accessible according to WCAG 2.1 Level AA standards
Collaborated with Deque Systems on comprehensive accessibility audits
Transitioned from polling architecture to WebSockets for long-running tasks
Developed proctoring solutions and improved component communication for remote assessments

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer I
experiences.description: As a full-time engineer, I was thrown into the deep end with large-scale migrations and system modernization. This period taught me more about application architecture than any course ever could, and sparked my passion for theming and design systems.
achievements: Led migration of HackerRank's Screen product from Backbone.js to React
Developed passion for theming and dark mode implementation
Led organization-wide initiatives on standardizing component library
Successfully convinced team to move away from jQuery with comprehensive technical presentation
Ensured theme consistency across products during modernization effort

experiences.title: Software Engineering Intern
experiences.description: Fresh out of college with a Metallurgical Engineering degree, I stepped into HackerRank as an intern. With more enthusiasm than experience, I was tasked with revitalizing their internal UIKit. This was where my frontend journey truly began.
achievements: Built my first Toast notification component for the internal UIKit
Created a React wrapper for CKEditor for content management
Set up linting configurations that became organizational standards
Built an entire intern website overnight after a bet with CTO Hari (and won! ✌️)
Laid the foundation for what would become core strengths in my career
